Package it.polimi.myShelfie.network

Class ClientHandler

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.myShelfie.network.ClientHandler
All Implemented Interfaces:
Runnable
public class ClientHandler extends Object implements Runnable
This is the network rep of the player. This class is useful to make the client-server communication possible Is important to remember that each ClientHandler is executed as a stand-alone thread. For each Player connected, a new ClientHandler thread is executed on Server pool.
